title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994 

(Section 11E(2)) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1st day of January, 2025. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(2)) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 1st day january 2025 interpretation

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires—
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires— 

“Act of 1994” means the Health Insurance Act 1994 (No. 16 of 1994) ; 

“Authority” means The Health Insurance Authority; 

“Principal Regulations” means the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 693 of 2024). 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and is also used 
in the Act of 1994 shall have in these Regulations the same meaning as it has in 
that Act unless the contrary intention appears. 

(3) A reference in these Regulations— 

(a) 

(b) 

to any other enactment shall, unless the context otherwise 
requires, be construed as a reference to that enactment as 
amended or extended by any other enactment, and 

a reference to a Regulation is a reference to a Regulation of these 
Regulations unless it is indicated that a reference to some other 
provision is intended. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [15] 3 

Amendment of Regulation 4 of the “Principal Regulations”
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation unless context otherwise requires-- act 1994 mean health insurance act 1994 (no 16 1994) authority mean health insurance authority principal regulation mean health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(2)) (amendment) regulation 2024 (s.i no 693 2024) (2) word expression used regulation also used act 1994 shall regulation meaning act unless contrary intention appears (3) reference regulations-- (a) (b) enactment shall unless context otherwise requires construed reference enactment amended extended enactment reference regulation reference regulation regulation unless indicated reference provision intended notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th february 2025 15 3 amendment regulation 4 principal regulation

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 3. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations, which amends by deletion
text_raw:
3. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations, which amends by deletion 
relevant contracts listed in the schedule to the Health Insurance Act 1994 
(Section 11E(2)) (No.5) Regulations 2014, is hereby amended by the substitution 
of “Aviva Health Insurance Ireland Ltd.” in paragraphs (a), (b), (c) and (d) of 
Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations, for “Elips Insurances Ltd.”. 

GIVEN under the Seal of The Health Insurance Authority, 

22 January, 2025. 

PATRICIA BYRON, 

Chairperson/Member. 

BRIAN LEE, 

 Authorised Officer 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [15]

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made by The Health Insurance Authority pursuant to 
Section 11E(2) of the Health Insurance Act 1994 , as inserted by section 15 of 
the Health Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012 and Section 8 of the Health 
Insurance (Amendment) Act 2013. These Regulations amend by substitution 
"Aviva Health Insurance Ireland Ltd." in paragraphs (a), (b), (c) and (d), to 
Regulation 4 of the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 693 of 2024), for “Elips Insurances Ltd.” 

 
 
 
 
 
 [15] 5
